Nightrazor floated in the air, thinking. It appeared that they knew he
was here somewhere, but not quite where, and they were being cautious.
As the shuttle landed Nightrazor continued to hold positon in the air,
converting to antigrav to disipate the heat signature he may have been
producing. 

"Stealth mission possibly compramised. Orders?" With a short burst of
coded communication he sent a directional message, one that should be
difficult to intercept.

Within a few moments a response came, equally coded and difficult to
discern, "Continue until untenable then move to position Bravo. Bravo
has been confirmed."

Nightrazor angled away from the curious Broddy and Chop, hoping his
latest ploy would help him to elude thier sensors. 

Preston
(Nightrazor)



--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Jotunn was thoughtful for a moment, but quickly came back.
> 
> Jotunn: Right. Be careful and report back often. Dinobot, try to find
> a spot to land.
> 
> Dinobot surveyed the area, then decided to land among a series of
> geysers in what would become Yellowstone park.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <kham31@...> wrote:
> >
> > Broddy and  Chop : nothing to report on the visual sir, but it
> seem's
> > to have a weird heat in the air: the flying is a bit ackward as we
> > were push up. Sir we are going to take a look Sir.
> > 
> > They lost altitude to try and find the hot spot slolwy
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Jotunn: Recon unit, whatever your name is now, you see anything
> out
> > there?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@>
> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > 
> > > > --- khamkain <kham31@> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > > Chop quickly salute Jotunn : Allright sir! 
> > > > > 
> > > > > He looked at Brody the he turned to the opening door. Enough
> was
> > said
> > > > > for these two brothers in arms. They both jumped out of the
> shuttle
> > > > > only to combine and transformed into a compact but heavily
> equiped
> > > > > transport chopper. Rapdly they rise up in the sky to be cover
> by the
> > > > > cloud scanning for pursuier while keeping a safe distance
> from the
> > > > > shutte.
> > > > 
> > > > Nightrazor watched as the chopper exited the shuttle and for a
> moment
> > > > he almost thought he had been discovered. But when he saw the
> Chopper
> > > > assume a watching posture he relaxed and continued to mirror
> the
> > > > movements of the shuttle maintained his shielding. The time was
> > not yet
> > > > ripe for attack, but when the time came . . .  
> > > > 
> > > > He did a mental inventory of his weapns and smiled inwardly as
> he
> > > > continued to fly.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > OOC: Yes, I was thinking of Star Trek as well when writing my
> last
> > > > pose. His cloak is much like the Romulan one, and shares a
> similar
> > > > weakness: He cannot attack while cloaked!  
> > > > 
> > > > *RATS!*   
> > > > 
> > > > >:)
> > > > 
> > > > Preston
> > > > (Nightrazor)
